Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Wollongbar Motel in Byron Bay, you'll be next to a golf course and convenient to Wategos Beach and Cape Byron Lighthouse. This family-friendly motel is within close proximity of Byron Bay Golf Course and Tallow Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 23 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and wedding services.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Planning an event in Byron Bay? This motel features 0 square feet (0 square meters) of event facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at Wollongbar Motel in Byron Bay, you'll be next to a golf course and convenient to Wategos Beach and Cape Byron Lighthouse. This family-friendly motel is within close proximity of Byron Bay Golf Course and Tallow Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Wategos Beach - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Cape Byron Lighthouse - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Byron Bay Golf Course - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Tallow Beach - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Tyagarah Nature Reserve - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Kings Beach - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi
Lake Ainsworth Sport and Recreation Centre - 15.6 km / 9.7 mi
Lennox Head Surf Life Saving Club - 16.1 km / 10 mi
Ballina Golf Club - 23.8 km / 14.8 mi
Ballina Jockey Club - 23.8 km / 14.8 mi
Ballina Fair Shopping Centre - 24.6 km / 15.3 mi
Shelly Beach - 24.7 km / 15.4 mi
Lighthouse Beach - 25.4 km / 15.8 mi
Ballina Naval and Maritime Museum - 26.2 km / 16.3 mi

The preferred airport for Wollongbar Motel is Gold Coast, QLD (OOL-Coolangatta) - 53.6 km / 33.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
